name: Grim Tales: Graywitch - Hidden Objects
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Once again, it’s up to you to save one of your family members who’s gotten themselves into trouble. Stacy Gray was researching the family history when she unwittingly opened a portal to the past, becoming trapped in a town in chaos. It seems your ancestor Victor had created a monster, and the people of Graywitch are up in arms. Reach back into the past to save your family in this amazing Hidden Object adventure!

• UNCOVER THE SECRET HISTORY OF THE TOWN OF GRAYWITCH!
What mysteries are being hidden in this sleepy little community? And what do they have to do with Victor’s scientific experiments?

• CAN YOU STOP THIS TERRIFYING MONSTER?
Get to the heart of this mystery through a town full of spooky hidden object scenes.

• GET SOME HELP FROM BEYOND THE GRAVE
Your ancestor’s ghost is there to help you solve cryptic puzzles and fantastic mini-games.

• STOP AN EVIL CULT IN THE EXCITING BONUS CHAPTER
Continue this adventure as another character and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Puzzle Pieces, morphing objects, and more!

*** Discover more from Big Fish! ***

*This game is best experienced on iPhone 5 and up.*
